metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2561 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.Description: OpenFabrics ibutils 1.5.7 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary filesvia a symlink attack on (1) ibdiagnet.db, (2) ibdiagnet.fdbs, (3)ibdiagnet_ibis.log, (4) ibdiagnet.log, (5) ibdiagnet.lst, (6)ibdiagnet.mcfdbs, (7) ibdiagnet.pkey, (8) ibdiagnet.psl, (9)ibdiagnet.slvl, or (10) ibdiagnet.sm in /tmp/.

criterions.comment: ibutils package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
